word:
I call upon my brethren to come to the help of the Lord against the mighty. I call upon my sisters to stand by their side and help them in the work. "Ye are not your own: for ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's."--Manuscript 35, 1896. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. April 11, 1985, Entire Ms.
